data.title: Docker container using Apache Mesos and Marathon
authors: Arun Gupta, VP, Developer Advocacy, Couchbase
data.meta_description: This blog will show how to setup Mesos, Marathon, and run a simple Docker image. Learn more about the Apache Mesos and Marathon.
